component.name: OceanBiogeoChemistry
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBiogeoChemistry required

component.name: OceanBioKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBioKeyProperties required

component.name: OceanBioTimeStepFramework
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBioTimeStepFramework required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Time stepping method for passive tracers.

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for ocean passive tracers parametrization scheme.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Time stepping method for ocean biology.

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for ocean biology parametrization scheme.

component.name: OceanBioSpaceConfig
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBioSpaceConfig required

parameter.name: GridConfiguration
parameter.definition: Configuration of the horizontal grid used for ocean biogeochemistry (same as Ocean or different?).

parameter.name: MeanResolution
parameter.definition: Mean horizontal resolution of the ocean biogeochemistry model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristrics
parameter.definition: Description of the of the horizontal grid used for ocean biogeochemistry.

parameter.name: GridConfiguration
parameter.definition: Configuration of the vertical grid used for ocean biogeochemistry (same as Ocean or different?).

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Total number of vertical levels in ocean biogeochemistry model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the vertical grid used for ocean biogeochemistry.

parameter.name: ListOfTracers
parameter.definition: List of tracers to which a damping is applied.

parameter.name: LatMin
parameter.definition: Southern boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LatMax
parameter.definition: Northern boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LonMin
parameter.definition: Western boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LonMax
parameter.definition: Eastern boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: UpperLevel
parameter.definition: Upper level of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LowerLevel
parameter.definition: Lower level of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method for transport for ocean biogeochemistry.

constraint.name: if Method is "different from Ocean Tracers"

parameter.name: MethodCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the specificities of the ocean biogeochemistry transport method (compared to Ocean tracers one).

component.name: OceanBioBoundaryForcing
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBioBoundaryForcing required

parameter.name: AtmosphericDeposition
parameter.definition: How deposition of biogeochemical matter from atmosphere is provided to ocean biogeochemistry model.

parameter.name: RiverInput
parameter.definition: How biogeochemical substances and particules present in rivers are provided to ocean biogeochemistry model.

parameter.name: SedimentInteractions
parameter.definition: How the sediments materials are provided to ocean biogeochemistry model.

component.name: OceanBioGazExchange
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBioGazExchange required

parameter.name: Present
parameter.definition: Is exchange of carbon dioxide taken into account in the air-sea interaction processes?

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Scheme used for formulation of CO2 transfer velocity.

parameter.name: Present
parameter.definition: Is exchange of oxygen taken into account in the air-sea interaction processes?

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Scheme used for formulation of O2 transfer velocity.

parameter.name: Present
parameter.definition: Is exchange of dimethyl sulfid taken into account in the air-sea interaction processes?

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Scheme used for formulation of DMS transfer velocity.

parameter.name: Present
parameter.definition: Is exchange of nitrogen taken into account in the air-sea interaction processes?

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Scheme used for formulation of N2 transfer velocity.

parameter.name: Present
parameter.definition: Is exchange of nitrogen oxide taken into account in the air-sea interaction processes?

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Scheme used for formulation of N2O transfer velocity.

parameter.name: Present
parameter.definition: Is exchange of carbon oxide taken into account in the air-sea interaction processes?

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Scheme used for formulation of CO transfer velocity.

component.name: OceanBioTracers
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBioTracers required

parameter.name: SulfurCycle
parameter.definition: Is sulfur cycle included in ocean biogeochemistry model?

parameter.name: ListOfSpecies
parameter.definition: List of species (gazeous, organic or mineral) that act as as nutriments.

parameter.name: NitrousSpecies
parameter.definition: List of nutriments derived from nitrogen.

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: List of chemical processes involving nitrogen.

component.name: OceanBioTracersEcosystem
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBioTracersEcosystem required

parameter.name: UpperTrophicLevels
parameter.definition: Definition of property name UpperTrophicLevels required

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Approach used to represent the phytoplancton in the ocean biogeochemistry model.

parameter.name: ListOfSpecies
parameter.definition: List of the different types of phytoplancton taken into account in the model.

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Approach used to represent the zooplancton in the biogeochemistry model.

parameter.name: ListOfSpecies
parameter.definition: List of the different types of zooplancton taken into account in the model.

parameter.name: Lability
parameter.definition: Is the lability of dissolved organic matter taken into account in the ocean biogeochemistry model?

parameter.name: BacteriaRepresentation
parameter.definition: Are bacteria taken into account in the ocean biogeochemistry model?

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: How the particulate carbon are represented in oceanbiogeochemistry model.

parameter.name: TypesOfParticules
parameter.definition: Type of particulate matter taken into account in the ocean biogeochemistry model.

parameter.name: SizeSpectrum
parameter.definition: Is a particule size spectrum used to represent distribution of particules in the water volume?

parameter.name: SinkingSpeed
parameter.definition: Method for calculation of particule sinking speed.

component.name: OceanBioChemistry
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBioChemistry required

parameter.name: pH-scale
parameter.definition: Definition of property name pH-scale required

parameter.name: ChemicalConstantsForCarbonateChemistry
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ChemicalConstantsForCarbonateChemistry required
